base_description: This circuit consists of 10 nodes and 17 branches. Regarding passive components, there are 10 resistor(s). For power supply, the circuit has 6 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. No measurements are configured. In total, this circuit comprises 16 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Change the resistive element (labeled 8) from 93mΩ to 186mΩ.
Modify the value of resistive element 9 from 22kΩ to 4kΩ.
Modify the value of resistive element 6 from 13Ω to 130Ω.
